Additional info: Standalone compute backend implementation. IBM VPC is the default. If set it will overwrite the `backend` set in lithops section
Runtime name to run the functions. Can be a Docker image name
If False then the VM is not stopped automatically. Run **exec.dismantle()** explicitly to stop the VM.
Time in seconds to stop the VM instance after a job **completed** its execution
Time in seconds to stop the VM instance after a job **started** its execution
One of: **consume** or **create**. If set to  **create**, Lithops will automatically create VMs based on the number of elements in iterdata
If set to True, Lithops will execute the command `docker pull <runtime_name>` in each VSI before executing the a job
